description: Also called "Aloma" by Marin. A mysterious young man with green hair who already seems to know about the Monomakias. Usually seen eating, he appears to be involved with the construction of something called Rainbow Bridge. In one instance, he refers to Earth as "the Funny World", exactly the same as the Lolo-creatures of Brigadoon do, meaning that he may also be from Brigadoon. He cares about marin very much and tries to help her when he can. It later is revealed that he is the same race as lolo and in fact is one of his friends lulu we also learn at the end that he was the leader of the renegade. When lolo ask him why he did this he simply replied that if he didn`t create the renegade and some death and destruction then a greater tragedy would happen to both worlds. He then returns to earth in his human form to watch over marin. He reveals even though marin isn`t creis she is still blood related, basically she is her ancestor.
name: Alo Makoto
